title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: bundles and serves Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. as a local REST API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving LLM, embed and chat interfaces backed by local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI that proxies to a local Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight CLI tool to pull, list and chat with models via Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-gui (PyQt desktop)
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models, built with PyQt5.

title: ollama4j (Java SDK)
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK wrapping the Ollama REST API with POJO models and streaming support.

title: ollama-rb (Ruby gem)
summary: Community Ruby client for integrating Ollama into Rails or scripts.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cuda, rocm, cpu) plus compose examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack (farm-ng)
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp (.NET client)
summary: Community C# client with async enumerators for streaming tokens.

title: ollama-codellama-vscode
summary: VS-Code extension that uses CodeLlama via Ollama for fill-in-the-middle code completion.

title: ollama-embeddings (npm)
summary: Tiny utility to generate sentence embeddings through Ollama’s nomic-embed or mxbai-embed.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama replies into threads with slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers DMs and mentions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag-langchain-tutorial
summary: Step-by-step notebook building a private RAG system with Ollama, LangChain and Chroma.
